subject: Millrose Games
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The Armory Foundation is likely to formally announce next week that it is relocating the 104-year-old meet to the Armory Track and Field Center in Upper Manhattan next year.
snippet: The Armory Foundation is likely to formally announce next week that it is relocating the 104-year-old meet to the Armory Track and Field Center in Upper Manhattan next year.
